fake.description: The user is pretending to be someone else or providing false information.

spam.description: The user is sending unwanted messages, advertisements, or links.

offensive.description: Messages contain offensive language, hate speech, vulgarity, or insults.

other.description: Please provide a detailed explanation of the issue.

explaination: Please provide a detailed explanation of the issue.
additionalDetails: Optional: Add additional details to help us better understand the issue.
reportIsAnonymous: Your report is anonymous, and the user you reported will not benotified about your identity.
thankYou: Thank you for helping us maintain a safe and respectful community.
reportReviewed: Your report will be reviewed by our moderation team. If necessary, we may take appropriate actions, including account restrictions or bans.
iConfirm: I confirm that the information provided is accurate and truthful to the best of my knowledge.
